node.title: Hundreds of kilometres from anywhere, Robinson River is in the middle of the NT's worst ever COVID outbreak
node.alt: An aerial view of a remote NT community
node.description: The COVID outbreak in the Top End is spread between the regional town of Katherine and the remote community of Robinson River, where a few hundred people have been plunged into lockdown.
node.content:
["It's 800 kilometres from the tiny community of Robinson River to the nearest major centre in Katherine.", "It's tucked away in the corner of the Gulf of Carpentaria and used to dealing with the isolation that comes each wet season, as roads are blocked and cyclones threaten to flatten homes.", "But now the 300-odd residents\u00a0are grappling with a new threat,\u00a0as Robinson River finishes another day in lockdown amid an outbreak confirmed on Monday.", "
A small place in the NT's vast\u00a0gulf region
", "Unless you're landing on the community's small airstrip, Robinson River is a long drive from Katherine and even further from Darwin.", "It's a 10-hour trip to Katherine, which includes a 150 kilometre stretch of dirt through Borroloola, a service hub\u00a0of about 1,000 people.", "", "
By road, the trip to Robinson River takes about\u00a010 hours from Katherine.(ABC News)
", "The land is managed by the Garawa rangers, with Eastside Kriol the main language spoken in the community, according to the NT government.", "
A few hundred people call Robinson River home
", "There are about 350 people in Robinson River.", "", "
Robinson River is linked to Katherine and also Borroloola, a larger community around 150 kilometres away.(Supplied: Sue Miller)
", "Like many of the Northern Territory's remote communities, Robinson River has a predominantly Indigenous population that is much younger than the rest of the country \u2013 a median age of 20, according to the 2016 census.", "It has a school with about 50 students and a small community store supplying groceries.", "Senator McCarthy and others have flagged their concerns about rates of overcrowding in the community, a factor that puts many remote parts of the NT at higher risk of transmission.", "
The vaccination rate is higher than elsewhere
", "Unlike some other remote NT communities, the vaccination rate in Robinson River is relatively high.", "NT Health figures show that at the start of the week, 87 per cent of people over 16 in the community had had at least one dose, while 77 per cent were full vaccinated.", "That is lower than some of the NT's most vaccinated communities, such as Milikapiti, where 97 per cent of people 16 and over have had at least one dose.", "But more than 50 remote communities across the Territory still have vaccination rates below 70 per cent, including at least five communities in Central Australia, where vaccine rates are below 10 per cent.", "
What do we know about the outbreak and the response?
", "The cluster between Katherine and Robinson River has affected Aboriginal Territorians with ties to both places.", "Robinson River and surrounding homelands went into lockdown on Monday, when the first case there was confirmed.", "NT\u00a0Deputy Chief Health Officer\u00a0Charles Pain\u00a0said the situation was serious and worrying.", "\"It's what we were concerned about, it's what we feared,\" Dr Pain said.", "A rapid response team has been delivering more vaccinations and COVID tests in the community since Monday night.\u00a0", "So far, dozens of people have returned negative results except for the new confirmed cases, who have been flown to the Howard Springs quarantine centre in Darwin.", "Authorities say the vaccination drive and testing efforts will go on as the lockdown continues.", "They say they don't yet know how far the virus may have spread in Robinson River or in Katherine."]
